name: RECRUIT
description: IF THERE IS NO ASSASSIN, BE THE ASSASSIN
info:
You are the backup character for the Assassin. If the Assassin card is buried you must carry out all responsibilities associated with the Assassin. You also gain all his initial powers.

You are his student, the next in command and only a huge deal if the Assassin card is buried.

name: YOUNGLING
description: IF THERE IS NO WEAPONSMITH, BE THE WEAPONSMITH
info: You are the backup character for the Weaponsmith. If the Weaponsmith card is buried, you must carry out Weaponsmith responsibilities (i.e. card sharing with the Assassin).
